description:
Pull request monitoring app for Github

Pullp is a tool to help you manage pull requests and reviews on your Github repositories, available for Mac, Linux and Windows.

An interactive dashboard shows all the open pull requests for your chosen repositories and highlights where your review has been requested.
This information syncs with Github every minute!
To help you keep track of things, Pullp has configurable desktop notifications to keep you in the loop.
